articles.title: Woman who gave birth while in a coma and battling Covid-19 meets newborn for first time - NBC News
articles.description: Nearly three months after giving birth while in a coma with coronavirus, a Wisconsin woman met her baby girl for the first time last week.
articles.content:
Nearly three months after giving birth while in a coma with Covid-19, a Wisconsin woman met her newborn child for the first time last week.

articles.author: Karen Weintraub, USA TODAY
articles.title: Only 38% of nursing home workers accepted COVID-19 vaccines, new data shows - Yahoo! Voices
articles.description: The first national-level figures show just 38% of nursing home staff members accepted the vaccine in early weeks, the CDC reported Monday.
articles.content: While residents of nursing homes and their caregivers have been considered a top priority for COVID-19 vaccination, only 38% of nursing home staff accepted shots when they were offered, new data from… [+9774 chars]
